title: Sending messages
content: I have tried nearly everything on all the forums and help sites to no avail. I still get the error message that my message cannot be sent. Most of the time I get the server response as [C20]: message blocked. I have triple-checked my SMTP server settings and password, uninstalled TB and re-installed. TB seems to have recently changed the profile in use, so it no longer has all the files in Mail\Local Folders it used to have. I'm thinking I need to create a new profile but I don't know how to do that.
creator: bb3902

title: Hi. When selecting > compose new message opens a new message containing machine language in the message body
content: Hi. When selecting > compose new message opens a new message containing machine language in the message body. Any ideas ? Thanks, DN
creator: dchrn4

title: Email preview settings
content:
I have two identical instances of the Thunderbird 115.11.0 (64-bit) installed on Fedora 40 (two different boxes) They display Email preview differently (See attached pictures)

Anybody knows how to change that view? What settings?
creator: vicgr1

title: Wachtwoord voor live.be
content: Beste ik moet de laatste tijd heel veel paswoord terug in brengen in Thunderbird maar meestal word het niet aanvaard al is het 100% juist en soms werkt het wel met zelfde paswoord en dan kan ik geen inkomede mails zien en zieker geen verzenden
creator: a.caers

title: Accessing old emails stored on hard drive
content: Hi – I have been with Thunderbird for a while now but didn’t use your email program as I have been using Gmail for several years and still do. When I finished with my previous ISP, I copied the folders holding all my old emails to the hard disk on my PC. Is there any way I can use Thunderbird to read/delete these emails using my hard drive as the source and without using an ISP?
creator: philkeena

title: replacing the password of an account connected to Thunderbird
content:
I recently have successfully changed, via my browser, the password of one of my Yahoo! accounts. Now, when I use my Thunderbird app, which collects my emails from many different accounts - including the Yahoo account - Thunderbird can no longer access my Yahoo! mail for the simple reason it still uses the old Yahoo! account password that had to be replaced. How can I get Tbird to know about the password change?

Hoping some kind person can help me out, an old gent in Thailand
creator: P_Puthorn

title: Importeren van Thunderbird mailachrief
content: Ik heb een nieuwe desktop PC en wil het Thunderbird mailarchief importeren in Thunderbird op de nieuwe PC. Ik heb het oude geexporteerd, het bestand op One Drive opgeslagen en wil het nu importeren. Helaas wordt niet alles geimporteerd. Bv niet alle submappen en de inbox slechts gedeeltelijk. Hoe kan ik dit het best doen?
creator: wolfhenk

title: Cant send or receive emails from gmail on TB
content: When I try to get my emails from gmail, message says there is error with certificate - see snip. I click on "confirm security exception" but it doesn't help. Still no emails. This has only just started in the last week or so. Originally emails would come through after accepting the certificate but now no emails can be sent or received. Help appreciated.
creator: jasminehenry0416

title: Thunderbird 115.11  gets seriously slow
content: Thunderbird 115.11.etc has become seriously slow when deleting or moving emails - the first one goes quickly but then it all slows down for the second and subsequent emails. I have found that this is a Virus checker issue - I use Microsoft's own defender software on Windows 11 - and have now eliminated the problem by making an exception in the virus software to the TB profile folder. My question is: how safe is this - I don't want to allow virus attacks in email but at the same time I don't want the slow software! What do you suggest? Thank you
creator: sthoselitz

title: Probleme mit Thunderbirth
content:
Guten Tag,

siehe Anlage!

Diese Fenster öffnen sich alle bei nur einer Sitzung, auf nur einem Computer!

Klicke ich etwas nur einmal an ("Mozilla Thunderbird Email", "E-Mail-Adresse vergessen?", "Datenschutzerklärung", " "Konto erstellen" (Anzeige es liegt ein Fehler vor) oder auf "Weiter" passiert nichts!

Auf mich macht das den Eindruck das jemand an meine Anmeldedaten ran will!

In der Zwischenzeit bekomme ich auf diesen einen Computer auch keine Gmail´s mehr. Diese lese ich auf meinem Handy oder auf den anderen Computer!

Ich kann kein englisch und arbeite auch nur mit dem Übersetzungsprogram.

Auf diesem Computer habe ich das Programm deinstalliert und später neu installiert. Das Problem ist geblieben.

Meine Alternative E-Mailadresse ist hanssy58@web.de da gibt es keine Probleme.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

Hans Sbrzesny

Hello,

see attachment!

These windows all open in just one session, on just one computer!

If I click on something just once ("Mozilla Thunderbird Email", "Forgotten email address?", "Privacy policy", "Create account" (message that there is an error) or on "Continue" nothing happens!

It gives me the impression that someone wants to get my login details!

In the meantime, I no longer receive any Gmails on this one computer. I read them on my cell phone or on the other computer!

I don't speak English and only work with the translation program.

I uninstalled the program on this computer and later reinstalled it. The problem remains.

My alternative email address is hanssy58@web.de and there are no problems there.

Best regards

Hans Sbrzesny
creator: hanssy58

title: In box mails delete
content: In box emails on my desktop computer disappear without trace, mail that is in deleted & archive accounts are still there. These emails are still on the server as all these mails, thankfully, are my laptop

content: Het versturen van mails duurt erg lang. Waar kan dit aan liggen.

title: Deleted by mistake my contacts, how do i recover them?!!!
content:
Hello there! I was in my Address Book and i was handling a sub-list of contacts. While i was in that list i pressed "delete" list but instead of deleting this sub-list, deleted all the basic list with my contacts... How can i restore that? I checked also in my Yahoo Mail and the contacts are also gone from there... I use IMAP, maybe that's the reason...

I use Thunderbird 1:115.11.0-1~deb10u1 in Linux Debian

creator: robin73

title: Thunderbird cannot read recovered emails in Outlook Inbox
content:
While managing my Thunderbird Inbox, I inadvertantly transferred a chunk of Inbox messages received from my MS Office365 Outlook account into the trash. I went into Outlook on the WebApp and discovered that all of the inadvertantly deleted emails were found under recover deleted emails. So within Outlook I recovered all mails into the Inbox. So far, so good.

Now I have all the mails listed in the Inbox on Outlook. But when I open Thunderbird again, the recovered mails do not show up. It seems that Thunderbird does not fully synchronize the folder and the recovered emails are not downloaded. Instead, all mails are once again removed from the Outlook Inbox. The previously recovered mails disappear again from the inbox of OWA and I have to recover them all again.

I have already tried several fixes. Within Outlook, I created a new folder and moved the recovered Inbox mails to that folder. This was done in the hope that this folder will then sync properly with Thunderbird. Unfortunately no. The folder does not sync and as soon as Thunderbird is closed again, all mails are deleted again from the new folder on OWA.

I also deleted the Outlook account (including all stored data) and recreated the account in Thunderbird. Unfortunately, the same thing happens again. The recovered mails are not displayed in Thunderbird and after closing the program, the mails are deleted again in OWA and I have to recover them again. Finally I went so far as to uninstall Thunderbird completely from my computer and reinstalled the software. That did not fix the problem either.

I will also provide another observation: in the past when I have recovered individual emails the same behavior has occurred. Seems that when Outlook or Exchange places a deleted email into the recovery queue, there is a change in its identify such that TB now views it as a deleted message.

Any suggestions on how this can be fixed?

Best regards
creator: mkostura

title: Thunderbird email inbox not downloading emails suddenly
content: Receiving email notifications in Thunderbird but they are not showing in my three different inboxes. Can read them via my mobile phone and if I log into my talktalk webmail? I am currently travelling and logged into a different IPS. There was no problem for the first couple of days. Could this be connected to the issue?
creator: lucytilney

title: Thunderbird 115X cannot find my outlook profile to import from my existing Outlook 2010 installation. I have set Outlook as my default e-mail app.
content: Following suggestions from Jame and Matt (Thanks, guys!), I just installed T-Bird 115X on my Win7 computer, and successfully set up my primary e-mail account. I tried to import settings from my existing Outlook 2010 installation, and was instructed to set Outlook up as the default app for email. I did so, but now I get a "No profile found" notification from T-Bird T-Bird. What should I do?
creator: soundguybsmt

title: search for posting by a specific contributor
content: In this help forum, is there a way to search for posting done by a specific Contributor? I find some contributors are very helpful and would like to see more of that person instead of reading thru a lot of posting. Thank you
creator: oldbob2

title: Pressing Enter key moves email message from Inbox to Trash
content:
Now and then, when I press the Enter key, Thunderbird moves the current email message from Inbox to Trash instead of opening the message in a new tab.

I am using Version 115.11.1 (32-bit) on Windows 11.
creator: Buddenbrook

title: can't download emails
content: I can't download my emails. It was working until my Foxfire was updated and now it is not working. What should I do?
creator: irlenrainbows

title: Changing server settings on account wants to restart as soon I leave first field
content:
v115.10.1 32-bit Changed isp and email completely, and wanted to change both server name and user name. But editing server name and leaving that field I get a popup wanting to restart - problem is I need to change user name as well or no go

So it starts to try and login but fails of course, since user name need to change too.

This really need another approach, maybe not so automatic.

Changing focus from first field to next one should not execute restart. - just when leaving second field if any of first and second is changed

So going through all accounts and failed logins etc all the way is cumbersome. - dual restarts every account

Not sure where to put bug reports like this. Thanks.
creator: gog756

title: smtp wrong credentials does not abort when cancel, but hang 30s or so
content:
v115.10.1 I made a mistake setting SMTP credentials, wrong protocol, and it just stays on Sending dialog. So I abort when I realize I made a mistake and come back to mail I was to send. - but 30-60s after I aborted comes an error message saying it timed out

So the cancel button does not really cancel the send attempt, it seems.

Not sure where to report bugs, so do it here. Thanks.
creator: gog756

title: Can't send
content: I can't send e-mail. I do receive it OK, though. It's asking me to enter a password. Why? Attached is a screenshot.Thanks.
creator: musiclady1949

title: Oh no! Help with Thunderbird on Mac
content: So I just changed hosting companies and now I can't access ANY of my emails in Thunderbird to change my incoming and outgoing server settings because the failed login messages keep coming up so fast I can't get past them. I can't be the only one who's ever had this happen. Is there a workaround?
creator: admin849
